abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32245769, pmid32246906, pmid32243778, pmid32241811, pmid32243599, pmid32241813, pmid32241880, pmid32246915, pmid32247016, pmid32246784, pmid32243813, pmid32245880, pmid32243818, pmid32242115, pmid32245830, pmid32246119, pmid32241761, pmid32245847, pmid32241766, pmid32246121, pmid32241884, pmid32246783, pmid32241815, pmid32245751, pmid32241762, pmid32246914, pmid32241756, pmid32243608, pmid32246905, pmid32247017, pmid32246782, pmid32243777, pmid32243607, pmid32246142, pmid32245770, pmid32246117, pmid32243815, pmid32246503, pmid32243814, pmid32246149, pmid32242947
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.04.04
